accussed_details.name: MOHAMMAD BAKHSH
allegation: Preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure

complaint_summary: The petitioner sought to challenge the preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure and raised objections to the procedure adopted by the Assistant Commissioner, Ahmadpur East.
investigation_summary: The Assistant Commissioner, Ahmadpur East, acted in accordance with the law under sections 107 and 119 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. No evidence of procedural violations was found.
judgment_summary: The court dismissed the petition, ruling that the preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure do not constitute an offence under the Pakistan Penal Code. The objections raised by the petitioner were deemed without merit.
legal_arguments: Preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure are not offences under the Pakistan Penal Code.
Section 494 of the Code of Criminal Procedure does not apply to proceedings under Chapter VIII.
Proceedings under section 107 can only be terminated under section 119 of the Code of Criminal Procedure.
key_issues: Validity of preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure.
Applicability of section 494 to proceedings under Chapter VIII.

legal_terms.Preventive Measures: Actions taken to prevent potential offences or breaches of peace.
legal_terms.Compounding: The process of settling a dispute or offence outside of court.

words_and_phrases.Preventive Measures: Actions under sections 107 and 151 to prevent potential breaches of peace.
words_and_phrases.Fair Trial: A trial conducted impartially and in accordance with legal principles.

summary_vector_notes: The case involved the dismissal of a petition challenging preventive measures under sections 107 and 151 of the Code of Criminal Procedure. The court ruled that these measures do not constitute offences under the Pakistan Penal Code and upheld the actions of the Assistant Commissioner, Ahmadpur East.
